alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 11:49PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buffalo and south central Sherman Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm centered a few miles west of Ravenna, or 23 miles north of Kearney, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Buffalo and south central Sherman Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
